metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0825 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Drupal 6.x before 6.23 and 7.x before 7.11 does not verify that AttributeExchange (AX) information is signed, which allows remote attackers tomodify potentially sensitive AX information without detection via aman-in-the-middle (MITM) attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
